info.queueContent: The data we publish is provided by hospitals, clinics, CT and MRI centers (nearly 14,000 medical facilities) that provide services under contract with the National Health Fund (NFZ).
info.content: Medical facilities directly provide information about treatment dates to NFZ. Hospitals and clinics are obligated to provide provincial NFZ departments weekly with information on the first available appointment (excluding services for patients undergoing diagnostics or oncological treatment), and monthly with information on waiting lists (excluding services for patients undergoing diagnostics or oncological treatment).
